skills.name: Programming
skills.summary: As a skilled programmer with a focus on AI engineering and backend systems, I work fluently across multiple languages to build robust and intelligent solutions. My experience spans across scripting, backend development, and machine learning pipelines.

sections.title: Python
sections.description: Used extensively for machine learning, data preprocessing, and deep learning workflows. Proficient in handling time-series data, building LSTM-based imputation models, and managing structured datasets with libraries like pandas, NumPy, and TensorFlow.

sections.title: JavaScript
sections.description: Applied mainly in web development, particularly in frontend interactions (React) and API communication. Strong understanding of asynchronous logic, DOM manipulation, and modern ECMAScript standards. Combined with TypeScript for type safety and scalability.

sections.title: Golang
sections.description: Focused on high-performance backend services and concurrent systems. Used for developing fast, stateless APIs, microservices, and real-time data pipelines. Appreciated for its simplicity, performance, and strong typing in production environments.

skills.name: Design
skills.summary: Creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces with a focus on user experience and modern design principles. My design approach combines aesthetic appeal with functional usability.

sections.title: UI/UX Design
sections.description: Designing user interfaces that prioritize usability and visual hierarchy. Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and creating design systems that scale across different platforms and devices.

sections.title: Frontend Development
sections.description: Translating designs into responsive, interactive web applications using modern CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS, along with component-based architectures in React for maintainable and scalable interfaces.

sections.title: Design Tools
sections.description: Proficient in industry-standard design tools including Figma for collaborative design work, Adobe Creative Suite for graphic design, and various prototyping tools for user testing and validation.

skills.name: Data Science
skills.summary: Comprehensive data science expertise spanning from data acquisition to advanced analytics. Strong research methodologies with practical experience in competitive data science environments and real-world forecasting applications.

sections.title: Forecasting Specialist
sections.description: Deep expertise in predictive modeling and time-series analysis. Specialized in economic forecasting, particularly in commodity price prediction with integration of exogenous features for enhanced model accuracy and reliability.

sections.title: Web Scraping & Data Acquisition
sections.description: Skilled in automated data collection and web crawling techniques. Proficient in extracting structured data from various sources, handling different data formats, and building robust data pipelines for continuous data ingestion.

sections.title: Research Methodology
sections.description: Strong foundation in research design, hypothesis testing, and statistical analysis. Experience in academic and competitive research environments with focus on reproducible results and methodological rigor.

skills.name: Network Engineering

sections.title: MikroTik Certified Engineer (MTCRE)

sections.title: Network Associate (MTCNA)
sections.description: Foundational expertise in network administration and configuration. Proficient in basic to intermediate networking concepts, routing protocols, and network security implementations using MikroTik systems.

sections.title: Competition Experience
sections.description: National finalist in Olimpiade Jaringan Mikrotik 2023, demonstrating practical networking skills under competitive conditions. Experience in network design challenges and real-world problem-solving scenarios.

skills.name: Leadership & Communication

sections.title: Team Leadership

sections.title: Public Speaking
sections.description: Confident presenter capable of delivering technical content to diverse audiences. Experience in explaining complex data science concepts, presenting research findings, and communicating project results to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

sections.title: Business Planning
